ygData.subject: Re: Research and Specialization
ygData.msgSnippet: No no hehe Each specialisation skill will cap at 50.  Seriously dont specialise in anything but alteration. What I would recommend is you train 1 poitn in each
ygData.messageBody:
No no hehe

Each specialisation skill will cap at 50. Seriously dont specialise in
anything but alteration.

What I would recommend is you train 1 poitn in each then cast a level 1 alt
spell like weaken on yourself until you get 51 in it.

- Baels
----- Original Message -----
From: "Jenni" <freya@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, December 15, 1999 2:45 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Research and Specialization


> From: Jenni <freya@...>
>
> Hi All!
>
> I was reading on eq.castersrealm.com about research (gettin close to 16
> and I REALLY want mesmerisation :) ), I need to find page 26 of
> Tsarin's Grimoire left and right for it. Does anyone know where it
> drops or where I might be able to buy it? Also, Is the tome of Endless
> Enchantments in the general Enchanter guild area or do I need to travel
> to find this as well?
>
> I also ran across the page on specialization, and it's got me curious
> now..
>
> This page says that the spell skills will cap at 50 skill and you can
> then specialize in one. I'm level 14 right now, and All of my spell
> skills are at 75 (except conjuration, which is at 36, uck, need to keep
> working on that one). Has something changed with specialization or am I
> just not understanding something?
>
> Thanks!
>
> Ezrae
> Level 14 Dark Elf Enchanter
> Brell Serilis
>
